required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on February 08, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Efficacy of Ramdicivir and Baricitinib for the Treatment of Severe COVID 19 Patients
clinical_study.official_title: Efficacy of Ramdicivir and Baricitinib Combination Therapy for the Treatment of COVID 19 ARDS

lead_sponsor.agency: M Abdur Rahim Medical College and Hospital

collaborator.agency: First affiliated Hospital Xi'an Jiaoting University

clinical_study.source: M Abdur Rahim Medical College and Hospital

brief_summary.textblock: This study was designed to evaluate the efficacy of Remdesivir and Baricitinib combination therapy for the treatment of severe Acute Respiratory Distress Syndrome (ARDS) caused by Coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19). Our aim is to compare the outcome of the "Remdesivir + Baricitinib" combination against "Remdesivir + Tocilizumab" therapy and find the best option for the management of ARDS in COVID-19 patients.

primary_outcome.description: Time to Clinical Improvement (TTCI) Defined as Time from Randomization to National Early Warning Score 2 (NEWS2) Score of </= 2 Maintained for 24 Hours.

secondary_outcome.description: Mortality Rate on Days during hospitalization
Duration of ICU Stay in days.
Duration of hospital stay in days.

secondary_outcome.measure: Rate of daily Supplemental Oxygen Use
secondary_outcome.description: Rate of daily Supplemental Oxygen Use by the patient
Time to Clinical Failure, Defined as the Time from Randomization to the First Occurrence of Death, Mechanical Ventilation, ICU Admission, or Withdrawal (whichever occurs first)

arm_group.arm_group_label: Group A: Remdesivir + Baricitinib treatment group
arm_group.description: Remdesivir (Injectable solution): A loading dose of Remdesivir I/V 5mg/kg (less than 40kg) or 200mg (>40kg) on day 1, then 2.5mg/kg (less than 40kg) or 100mg (>40kg) daily following randomization. + Baricitinib (oral tablet form): Baricitinib tablets 4 mg/day for 2 to 4weeks

arm_group.arm_group_label: Group B: Remdesivir + Tocilizumab treatment group
arm_group.description: Remdesivir (Injectable solution) A loading dose of Remdesivir I/V 5mg/kg (less than 40kg) or 200mg (>40kg) on day 1, then 2.5mg/kg (less than 40kg) or 100mg (>40kg) daily following randomization. + Tocilizumab (Injectable solution): Tocilizumab I/V 8mg/Kg up to 800mg highest 12 hours apart.

intervention.description: Remdesivir 100 IV Infusion as a lyophilized powder
intervention.arm_group_label: Group A: Remdesivir + Baricitinib treatment group
Group B: Remdesivir + Tocilizumab treatment group
Group A: Remdesivir + Baricitinib treatment group
Group B: Remdesivir + Tocilizumab treatment group

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
Severe COVID-19 patients require hospitalization under HDU/ICU. The SARSCoV-2 infection will be confirmed by RT PCR / CT Chest in every case.
Exclusion Criteria:
Participants with uncontrolled clinical status who were hospitalized from the before. Contraindication / possible drug interaction. Participants who have any severe and/or uncontrolled medical conditions like, Severe ischemic heart disease, epilepsy, malignancy, Pulmonary/ renal/hepatic disease, AIDS, Pulmonary TB, pregnancy, Corpulmonale, and etc.
